name: Guitar Galaxy: A new rhythm game
name_original: Guitar Galaxy: A new rhythm game
description:
Guitar Galaxy is the ultimate music-rhythm style game that will test your skills to play the guitar and follow the rhythm of the music.

Train your precision reflexes help of this unique and fun game.

After tapping the drives and precision timing and rhythm get score. Also you can choose songs from your mobile device for even more fun!

Hit the notes at the right time to get the highest score!
